name: México 68
description:
Description

Mexico 68 is Beat em up! game set during the Tlatelolco protest of octuber 2 of 1968, where terrible events took place.

This is a newsgame where we try to tale what unfolded during the Tlatelolco protest in octuber 2 of 1968.

This game was made in 48 hours during the Game Jam Plus 2022/23.

Game Jam Topics

Tell a tale again.

Back to the future

Try with friends
